Name: Free Town
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: SHAKE (or stir) all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Created in 2004 by Alexandra Fiot at Lonsdale, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Free Town contains 228 calories
